original_text: And Shem lived after he fathered Arpachshad 500 years and had other sons and daughters.
korean_text: 아르박삿을 낳은 후에 오백 년을 지내며 자녀를 낳았으며

sentences.original_text: And Shem lived after he fathered Arpachshad 500 years
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 셈은 아르박삿을 낳은 후 500년을 더 살았으며

sentences.original_text: and had other sons and daughters.
